-- We don't send a file back to Demica, if we received an 'empty' file without
-- Create MT101 instruction to transfer money from the buyers account

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INVS where INVS_MT101_CLNA_ID > 0 and INVS_INVO_NO in (select SFIN_INVO_NO from :1/SFIN where SFIN_SFIP_NO = :2)

Text.val: -- Check if there are SCF_FILE_INBOUND_INVOICE rows
-- Check if there are INVOICE_SCF rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INVS where INVS_PAIN_ID > 0 and INVS_INVO_NO in (select SFIN_INVO_NO from :1/SFIN where SFIN_SFIP_NO = :2)
